nplcit.text: American National Standard Specification for Credit CardANSIX4.13-1971 approved April 28, 1971 by ANS institute
The last coupon: Journal of Accountancy, Aug 1980, 150, 000002, Proquest Central, pg 24
An analysis of experimental buying, Fred W Morgan, Academy of Marketing Science, Journal WInter/ Spring 1978, 6, 1/2, Proquest Central pg 12
Role of product related conversations, Arndt Johan, Journal of Marketing research, Aug 1967, 4, Proquest Central, pg 291

abstract.p: A method for distributing and reliably redeeming electronic cash value vouchers that uses existing POS terminals. The vouchers may be distributed via mobile telephones. The voucher comprises an alphanumeric code which is entered into the standards compliant POS terminal. The system checks that the voucher is valid and provides a redemption value to the POS which can be credited by the retailer. The transaction can then be completed by the retailer using known methods.
